text: The Sex of Angels is a 1968 Italian-West German drama film directed by Ugo Liberatore and starring Doris Kunstmann, Rosemary Dexter and Laura Troschel. ==Plot== ==Cast== *Bernard De Vries as Marco *Rosemary Dexter as Nancy *Doris Kunstmann as Nora *Laura Troschel as Carla *Giovanni Petrucci as Luca *Efisio Cabras as Sergio *Brizio Montinaro as Pietro ==References== ==External links== * Category:Italian films Category:Italian drama films Category:West German films Category:1968 drama films
title: The Sex of Angels
